title: Understanding Data Modeling
text: Data modeling is a crucial step in understanding and organizing data. It involves creating a visual representation of data and its relationships.

hintAnswer: the process of creating a model, simulation, or $$small-scale$$ representation of data and the relationships among pieces of data
title: Defining Data Modeling
text: What is the primary purpose of data modeling?
choices: the process of creating a model, simulation, or $$small-scale$$ representation of data and the relationships among pieces of data
the process of making models to input and export data
a method of managing the data
